root.name: Koffi: Yellow Kopter
root.description: Overview/GameplayIn this game, players must gather water from ponds, lakes, rivers, and oceans to douse fires. The main enemy is a fire called Pyro. Players, whilst retrieving water, must be careful not to bump into buildings or trees. Players get bonus points for pushing animals off screen. Grateful animals will help douse the fire and collect water.
